name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.1 Bonus Unit: Citrin
summary: Description: Adds Citrin, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 1: Super Special Dreamer 1-3
summary: Description: A new adventure in the Sapphire Waterlands, featuring three brand new quests! Citrin and Spinel take center stage as main characters! Just what will become of the mysterious treasure hunt on the faraway island?

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - CoH 3: Felpurr
summary: Description: A special unit that hearkens back to an older title in the series, this special Felpurr is straight out of Class of Heroes 3. This Felpurr is no stronger and no weaker than any of the other Felpurrs that can be recruited in the game.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - CoH 3: Dwarf
summary: Description: A special unit that hearkens back to an older title in the series, this special Dwarf is straight out of Class of Heroes 3. This Dwarf is no stronger and no weaker than any of the other Dwarves that can be recruited in the game.

name: Adrianne and Oliver
summary: 7 days to achieve your goals. Build your relationship with characters through the choices, leading to different events and then the final outcomes. We’ll have 9 endings, 60 breathtaking sex animations, and more than 750 static images.

name: A Devilish Nightmare
summary:
A 20-Minute Psychological Horror Experience

Troubled by your traumatic nightmares, you play as a little boy who is going to sleep like usual, but little does he know that the night is about to get hectic for him once more. Tortured by his nightmares, the boy is unsure of what's real and what's not. The fear is taking over and you must overcome these nightmares or completely lose your sanity and perish in the void...

name: Adventures in the Dimension of Insidual Cruelitude.
summary: A cancelled sequel to Adventures in the Galaxy of Fantabulous Wonderment made by Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw.

name: Adrian's Tale
summary: One day most of the animals disappeared and Hero has to find out what happened the night when animals have disappeared and bring them back. For this purpose the Hero has to travel a lot, search for various items and weapons as well as solve puzzles, fight against enemies and bosses.

name: Adanath
summary: Adanath is a 2.5D side scrolling single player, action and exploration oriented, story based adventure game with a fluid & innovative PvE combat system.

name: Adventure of Elysia
summary: Experience a new adventure on the mysterious island of Elysia! Follow the hints, explore the world, solve dungeons and unravel the mystery of the island. Will you be able to uncover the truth?

name: A Detective's Demise
summary: A Detective’s Demise is a dark, tech-noir inspired 3D audio adventure experience. Take on the role of the “Detective,” a Lambton enforcer with a few tales to tell; as you delve deep in the grime and mystery of a future District 5. Traverse the mean streets of Dusklight’s most brutal district as you search for “her,” encountering all manner of creatures, the lowest of the low, emboldened with heightened technology at your side. Pitch Black: A Detective’s Demise.

name: Adventure with Firefly
summary: This is a a nonsenscial story about Matchstick Men!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 2: Danger Mountain March 1- 3
summary: Description: A new adventure in the Dia Earthlands, featuring three brand new quests! Kiesel and Lazuli take center stage as main characters! Just what kind of chaos unfolds as Lazuli undergoes a rigorous training regiment?

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Kiesel
summary: Description: Adds Kiesel, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Lazuli
summary: Description: Adds Lazuli, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Challenge Quest: Danger Mountain March EX
summary: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Danger Mountain March. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Adrenaline Gamer
summary: Adrenaline Gamer is a full Half-Life Deathmatch replacement mod and is considered to be the OSP mod for Half-Life. For those of you who are unfamiliar with Adrenaline Gamer, think of it as an extension to HLDM which offers more choices, more control, more options, more features... and ultimately more fun!

name: Adaptory
summary: Deep in uncharted space, your expedition took a challenging turn when your ship crash-landed. Master complex simulations to keep your outspoken explorers alive, face unpredictable challenges, and figure out a way back home.

name: AdvLite
summary: AdvLite - Side-Scroller Platformer, procedural generation creates unique worlds and every run is a special gaming experience.

name: Aden
summary: Dance! Dance! There's nothing to do but dance! A kawaii belt-scrolling dance battle for the new age! You save the world from destruction by controlling the mysterious girl and Akaka who appeared from the sky!

name: Adventure Llama Bundle
summary: This bundle consists of two awesome point-and-click adventures from Epic Llama Games studio. A great offer for all fans of the genre!

name: A day in the life of a sea witch
summary: Rhere is a lack of bitsy mermaid games... so of course i had to make a game about a cecaelia that featured mermaids

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Content Vol. 3
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 3: Linking Light's Successor 1-3
summary: Description: A new adventure in the Shadowlands, featuring three brand new quests! Euclase and Lapis take center stage as main characters! What is the truth behind the new threat that looms over the entire continent?!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Euclase
summary: Description: Adds Euclase, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Lapis
summary: Description: Adds Lapis, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Challenge Quest: Linking Light's Successor EX
summary: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Linking Light's Successor. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Adventures of Skye the Slime Maid
summary: Join the cool and sociable MC's RPG medieval-themed, romance-comedy, fantasy visual novel adventures with his magical, beautiful monster girl, slime maid, to become the best Adventurers in the country.

name: A Drop of Hope
summary: Use your different physical properties and states of matter to overcome challenges in this 2D puzzle platformer. Set in an oppressive industrial world dominated by machines, you are the only hope to restore nature and save the planet.

name: Adventure Awaits
summary: Adventure Awaits bucks the current trend of endless stats & dialog by bringing back the era of the Ultimas (Exodus, Quest for the Avatar, etc.) when RPGs were simpler and more approachable. The story, quests, and all maps are procedurally generated to provide endless replayability.

name: Adrenalin Connection
summary: "I shall take my revenge on the peaceful St. Eastern high school" - an anonymous letter arrived at the school. The principal asks the new teacher to investigate the source of the letter. At the same time transfer students are being forced to drop out one by one because of bullying...

name: A Dark Sky Over Paradise
summary:
In the future, Earth's resources have been stretched to their limit from it's ever expanding population and the future of mankind looks very bleak and hard. The governing body, FourNations have devised a plan to colonise Mars to send the overspill of man to ease the problems on Earth. The building starts well but the cost spirals out of control sending Earth into a deep recession. Years later the project is still proceeding but very slowly and you have been sent to a MoonBase for some unknown instructions that could be to do with the launch of a rocket and keep the colonisation project moving. As you are summoned to various meetings a bomb explodes and you find out that it from a terrorist group called the Mining Group who are trying to prevent the launch of the rocket.

In this text adventure you have to explore various locations described by text, to find out what your mission is, find out more about the terrorist group and what their reasons are. You type in commands with the keyboard to interact with your locations, objects and people.

name: Advendows Calendar OS 2022
summary:
This is an escape room type game, disguised as an advent calendar, made in a couple of gruesome nights for my wife.

You have to click through 24 different "apps" on a virtual desktop, play some games and solve some puzzles to escape the Desktop Dimension and celebrate a peaceful christmas.

name: Advise the King
summary: A roguelike chess-based deck building game.

name: Adibou: À la recherche de Robilloc
Adventure Beaks
summary: Adventure Beaks is a side scrolling auto runner, where you try to dodge obstacles by swiping up and down to jump, crouch or dive. There are multiple worlds with levels to progress through. Each level also has artifact parts and letters scattered through out to collect.

name: Adventure in the Park
summary: Clone of JungleTac's One Day of Mr. Potato (or "Mr. Onion"); the graphics are entirely redone. Released in Sega Genesis Flashback.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Lost Expedition
summary: Adventure Mosaics - Lost Expedition. Uncover hidden pictures! Choose your own adventure! 150 exciting levels for players of all ages!

name: Adventures of Red and Carmine
summary: The Adventures of Red & Carmine is a simple platformer game with soft background music and fun gameplay, with the special feature to play as Red and Carmine as they adventure through different worlds, and find their way back to each other and go back home.The demo version features Red only.

name: Adventure with the Goddess
summary: The adventurer, summoned to the Otherworld, journeys with the goddess Mershana to the Temple of Legends. Together with the goddess, the adventurer will defeat monsters and have fun with her!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.1 Bundle
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.2 Bundle
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.3 Bundle
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Freshman's Weapon Set
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Additional Character Lapis
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Class of Heroes 3 Collaboration: Additional Character Dwarf
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Class of Heroes 3 Collaboration: Additional Character Felpurr
Adventurous Hearts
summary: Jump aboard for an island-hopping adventure with a gentle wanderer, feisty warrior, and animal-loving archer. Lead these three beauties across the globe in a swashbuckling fight against evil – can you save the world while maneuvering through the turbulent waters of love?

name: Adventure's Pixel World
summary: Face goblins, trolls, bats, giant golems, spiders, angry chickens, dangerous traps and much more to complete levels that get more and more challenging. Collect as many candies as you can to unlock stronger characters. Attention: Only legends will succeed!

name: Adventure Slots HD: Titan's of Las Vegas Fortune Casino
summary:
“One of the best slot games I’ve ever played”. Jump into Casino Adventure with this exciting multi-line slot game. Spin the bonus wheel to win big fortune! This virtual video slot game gives you that Las Vegas feeling without losing you real money. Feeling lucky?
You’ll enjoy many perks while playing this exciting game: for your entertainment you will get access to 6 machine themes: Greek Gold, Amazon Queen, Jurassic Jackpot, Queen of the Nile, World War and, Pirate Slots.
With multiple levels, bonus games, hourly bonuses, and loads of machines, this is the slot game for you!

name: Advent of Ascension
summary: Advent of Ascension is a massive adventure and exploration mod for Minecraft designed to flesh out every area of the game as much as possible. It adds 21 new dimensions, each with its own items, ores, blocks, mobs, dungeons, and bosses. In addition to new tools and armor, players can access a set of special skills that offer perks at higher levels.

name: A Date with Yesterday
summary: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Adventurer Flower
summary: You're a flower in an office and there are three hidden games based on balance and memory challenges in there.

name: Adam and Eve: Crossy River
summary: Help Adam & Eve cross the river! Make sure they both don't drown or get bitten by giant crabs and other dangerous animals while making it safely to the other side!

name: Adventure Trip: Amazing World 2
summary: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: Adelie: Water Under the Bridge
summary:
Harvest fish daily to keep the baby penguins fed. Be careful, the fish won’t go without a fight!

Move toward a fish while adjacent to it to attack it. Mola Molas (the large fish) take two hits to capture, while everything else only needs one. Carefully plan your route in this turn-based dungeon crawler to out-maneuver the fish- how many fish can you harvest?

name: Adventure's Calling
summary: Adventure's Calling is a relaxing educational game that tests your geography skills by flying around the world in a house held up by balloons!

name: Adventure Field 5
summary: After destroying the calamity king, Edrian reality is broken by his so-called dead father. The kingdom he once knew is gone and everyone with it as no memory of this distant reality. With only him, recalling his former reality, Edrian will have to find a way to get back what may be lost forever.

name: Adorable Witch 5: Lingering
summary: Adorable Witch 5: Lingering is a relaxed and casual level decryption game, which still continues the magical worldview setting of the previous game. You need to guide pure water to fall on the seeds by destroying the stone slabs in the scene to ensure the growth of the seeds.

name: A Desert Christmas Story
summary: Fly around an infinitely generated world as Santa with a mouse-based flying controller. Deliver presents to households with a blue exclamation mark, coal to houses with a red exclamation mark, and Christmas Cheer to those with a boomstick! Dodge missiles being shot at you and deploy counter ELFlares

name: Advenger of Stuart
summary: Players will take on the role of a young man named Stuart. A college student meets a gorgeous fairy that will lead the player to conquer his dream to end this loop. We must defeat all the visitors and the enemies that come into his nightmare before they kill him.

name: A Dream That Never Wakes Up
summary: In the game, the character manipulated by the player has an infinite bullet weapon.

name: Advance Wars
summary: Lead a cast of colorful characters in fun, turn-based battles with two classic campaigns.

name: Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising
summary: Ten-hut! It’s time for basic training on the Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp game! Guide your units in tactical, turn-based battles, find the CO Power that best fits your playstyle, and defend your HQ from opposing nations.

name: Adventures of Helio
summary: Adventures of Helio is a 2D platformer with a dark fantasy setting inspired by Central America. Fight scary enemies, overcome tough challenges, discover powers, and more through 60 levels.

name: Adventure Reborn
summary:
Adventure Reborn is a deeply moving adventure game where you make decisions that influence the story of a loving family!
Save Hope’s parents, kidnapped by a mysterious cult. You decide who to trust. You can help Hope get her loved ones back!

name: Adachi Dating Simulator
summary: This is just a meme dating game.

name: Adrenaline Dungeon
summary: Adrenaline Dungeon is a top-down dungeon crawler game, play as an unknown man stuck in a time-looped dungeon. Uncover clues to discover a new order trying to rewrite history. Use different weapons and abilities to escape the dungeon and prevent history from being rewritten.

name: Adventure Apple Robots
summary: Help the hero to find out why his brother is always running away, explore this fantastic world and unlock new skills as he ventures.

name: A Day Out with Ube
summary: "It's another grey morning here in the Matamis' mansion, you pry your eyes open to the bright grey clouds with your consciousness finally creeping in to get you awake. Though, this day doesn't really seem to be like any other day you've had. In fact, you might just be in for a day out for one of the missus' kids." -some lunatic trying to narrate this

name: Adibou d'chou soigne les animaux
summary: Educational game for pre-schoolers set in a Zoo.

name: Adibou d'chou: Jardin des surprises
summary: Educational game for pre-schoolers set in a magical garden.

name: Adibou Anglais
summary: Educational game for teaching young children English as a second language.

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 4-5 ans
summary: An educational game focused on reading and math for 4-5 year old children.

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 5-6 ans
summary: An educational game focused on reading and math for 5-6 year old children.

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 6-7 ans
summary: An educational game focused on reading and math for 6-7 year old children.

name: Adibou: Aventure dans le corps humain
summary: An educational game about human anatomy aimed at children ages 4-8.

name: Adibou Nature et Sciences
summary: An educational game about Nature and Science targeted at children ages 4-8.

name: Adibou d'chou au Pays des Bonbons
summary: An educational game for children ages 2-5 set in a land of candy.

name: Adibou d'chou au cirque
summary: An educational game for 2-5 year olds set in a circus.

name: Adibou d'chou fête son anniversaire
summary: An educational game for 2-5 year old children set at a birthday party.

name: Adventures in Equica: Unicorn Training
summary:
Master powerful magic, venture through dungeons, and explore the monster-filled forest of Equica! Clover is the unicorn apprentice of Grand Swirllock the Bearded. She needs to learn the 10 basic combat spells every mage must master to survive fights against the monsters of Equica.

Traverse deadly dungeons to unlock more spells and extend your life energy! Beat all the dungeon bosses to prove you’re tough enough to take on any dangerous quest!

name: A Day At the Track
summary: A horse racing simulator where you bet your players money on the horse to win the race. If your horse wins you get paid. Run the other bots or joined twitch users out of money to be named the victor of the track.

name: Adventures of Steve the Cat
summary: You are a cute cat Steve, who has to go through a lot of beautiful, exciting and dangerous locations. On the way you will meet a lot of enemies created by a crazy professor.

name: Adventure Puss
summary: Adventure Puss is a retro platformer where the player takes on the role of a cat battling rats in their underground complexes. The player must prevent the rats' cunning plans using their dagger and exploring many locations.

name: Adorimon: Adventure of Monster
summary:
Collect and train Adorimon, build a team to fight other monster armies.

This is a classic monster catching game, form your team and fight to win.

A long way ahead to evolve your army. Be the best Adorimon trainer.

name: Advance Wars Returns
summary: Advance Wars Returns is a romhack of Advance Wars 2 and it contains a brand new story with 42 new campaign missions in both a normal and a hard difficulty, a completely new War Room with 30 missions, an AWBW section in Vs. Mode for your PvP desires and reworked CO-Power mechanics and COs.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Autumn Journey
summary: Ellie used to think that autumn was a bad time to travel. This journey proved her wrong!

name: Adventure Escape Room Bundle
summary: Four escape room adventures for you to puzzle through! Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

name: Adventures of Ben: Rabbit Run
summary: World of Valentardia will not let you get bored for a second! Adventures will require the hero to be not only determined but also to be faithfully accepted.

name: Adventure Ball 3D Balancer
summary: 3D Balancer Ball - every level is different from another, good graphics and optimization, nice physics, more than 13+ obstacles, lot of skins for ball, explore the world, collect diamonds and buy whatever skin you want and lot of surprises.

name: Advance Wars by Web
summary: Advance Wars by Web (aka. AWBW) is an unofficial site created by Aaron Marriner in 2004 that allows people to play Advance Wars multiplayer online in a web browser. AWBW is primarily based upon Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising with select gameplay elements added in from Advance Wars 1 and Advance Wars: Dual Strike, but also expands upon the vanilla experience by including a wider selection of COs than any previous game in the series, up to 16 players per match, additional content and quality-of-life (and some bugs and glitches here and there) and a broad array of community-focused features such as custom maps, spectator controls, replays and a ranked matchmaking system.

name: Adventures of JoJo & ToTo
summary:
The ultimate educational tool for your child from toddler to elementary school. Learn to read, match, spell, add, subtract, multiply and sharpen their motor skills all in one app!
JoJo and ToTo are two monkeys who love to play with their friends LoLo, DoDo and HoHo. But JoJo has a problem, he doesn't like being a monkey.
Does he become a lion? Or a donkey? Find out!
There are two versions of the story; a "big kid" story for elementary school kids and a "little kid" story for toddlers and pre-schoolers.
Your child will learn to believe in themselves as JoJo learns and experiences how other animals live.

name: A Deep Rest
summary: A Deep Rest is a collection of short stories about men and their relationship with mental health and depression. Taking control of a different character in each story, you will experience life from their perspective. See the problems and issues they face and help them find ways to be alright again.

name: A Date with Death
summary: Fight against and romance the one hunting for your soul in A Date with Death, a chat simulator visual novel where you date the Grim Reaper himself. Create your own character, decorate your apartment, and chat away with the charming yet dangerous Grim Reaper through fully voiced video calls.

name: Adam
summary: Adam is a sci-fi based Rogue-like FPS game. High action and adventure await you in this futuristic universe. Fight by living the story of Yavuz with various weapons and excellent environments!

name: Adivinhe o Jogo
summary: A quiz where have to guess the game name using the available reviews of the game, hints and soundtrack. Use the twitch integration so your chat can help you.

name: Adorabilis
summary: "Adorabilis" is a game where you control a white ghost to protect adorabilis from various threats while sending it home. You'll have to dodge enemies and trap, or using skills to get through difficulties on the way to home.

name: Adventure Reporter Ocean
summary: Discovery Adventure Reporter Ocean is a side-scrolling platformer based in an ocean-like environment. The game disc used to be distributed inside Nesquik cereal boxes.

name: Adventure Reporter Jungle
summary: Adventure Games 1 of 3 in each promo pack. Take up the challenge, take pictures, create a magazine. In an exciting computer game you will become a brave reporter. You will have to collect amazing facts and take pictures of rare animals and then make your own magazine!

name: Adventure Reporter Arctic
summary: An old 2012 cereal game (promo game included on cereal boxes) lost in time. It's a game were you are a man whose job is to collect coins and take photos of wild animals during your journey on the wild lands of Antarctica.

name: Adamgelion
summary: Adamgelion: An action shooter where you're a young sorceress fighting dark forces. Destroy enemies with fireballs and lightning, conquer 20 levels, and save the world. Diverse enemies, arena-style gameplay, and randomly generated levels for endless fun.

name: A Dream About a Room With Four Doors
summary:
Ever wanted to be trapped in a recurring nightmare? Sure, we all do! Now here's your chance to plunge into a malevolent DrEaMScApE, and to try to find your way out.
A Dream About a Room With 4 Doors puts you in the pajamas of a tormented soul who can't wake up until overcoming the challenges of their own nightmare. Something in the dream-realm wants to keep the sleeper asleep forever -- but now another force has arrived to help find a way out!

This game will be evolving over time, with new puzzles and challenges in future updates. Your support will help me have the time and resources to continue development.

name: A Dark Room
summary: Critically acclaimed, minimalist text-based rpg. Come light the fire.

name: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire
summary: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire is a simple and short game where you get to put an end to the man who initiated World War II.

name: A Doomer Boards Christmas Carol
summary:
It's that time of year again. Snow is falling, carolers are caroling... and Cyberneezer Scrooge has frozen time to stop Santa from delivering everyone's Christmas presents!

Sounds like a job for Doomguy, right? Well, to be honest, you're just not feeling the Christmas spirit this year. Although... hmmm... you still haven't looked at the Christmas cards those Doomer Boards Krew folks sent you yet! Maybe that'll be just the thing to help you feel some Christmas cheer...

A Doomer Boards Christmas Carol is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset from various members of Doomer Boards, containing 12 maps of jolly action and a heartwarming 13-map narative from @Big Ol Billy. Merry Christmas Doomers!

name: Adversary Tower
summary: The evil wizard has used a poisonous potion to pollute the village's water supply. You must use the 7 steps of your Adversarial Thinking training to infiltrate his tower, steal back the potion of purity, and safely escape.

name: Ad Victoriam
summary: Ad Victoriam lets you experience large scale immersive battles and lead Caesar's legions to victory in a groundbreaking simulator! You can start up custom battles or play a full strategy game as you conquer Gaul and establish the Roman Empire!

name: A Dog of Flanders
summary: A Dog of Flanders is an adventure game based on the novel of the same name by the British author Ouida.

name: Adverse Effects
summary: Judith has been having issues sleeping, so her solution was to see her doctor. The doctor prescribed her some new sleeping pills that have some Adverse Effects. You play the recipient of these feelings; what will you do when her normal affections turn into something more?

name: Adventurous Mind
summary: Explore the depths of suspense, adventure, and intrigue with this bundle of must-have games: Alfred Hitchcock - Vertigo, Beyond a Steel Sky and Syberia 3. Immerse yourself in fascinating worlds, solve captivating mysteries and discover extraordinary stories.

name: A Dino Date
summary: A game where you play as a velociraptor finding love. You are expected to craft, harvest, and create items using a variety of methods. Players must have a keen eye and be willing to monitor stats such as their health and energy - finding love is hard work!

name: Adventure Field Remake
summary: A long time ago, in the fabled kingdom of Sarook, a young boy was witness to words of light filling his dreams. An evil aura had consumed and poisoned the Sarook King's soul, and the corruption swayed him to unleash an army of monsters upon his own kingdom. Relive the very start of the legend...

name: A Date for the Ages
summary: A Date for the Ages is a short, adult visual novel filled with humor, alternate endings, several animations, and CGs.

name: Adventure of the Skullmancer
summary: "Adventure of the Skullmancer" is a Rogue-Like action game where players take on the role of a skeleton mage who ventures into an underground world, encounters companions, summons amusing skeletons, and battles enemies. Ultimately, they unravel the mysteries of this enigmatic world.

name: Adonis: Escape from Urania
summary: 17-map Boom megawad, sequel of Urania. After defeating the tyrant monster from Urania, your spaceship was hit by unknown forces and you had to catapult back to the surface of Urania, in the industrial area, between the jungle and the mountains. Earth coalition ships are under fire and cannot help you. Received information from the command center: this time the threat comes from the moon of Urania - Adonis. The task is to find a way to get to Adonis and destroy the enemies there.

name: Admiral: Battle for Uranium
summary:
Prepare your nukes, and obliterate your opponents with an apocalyptic thermonuclear barrage, but get it wrong and their devastating counter attack will bring you to your knees! S.M presents its second title, Admiral, a stunning simulation of global thermonuclear war.

You play the role of a military general hidden deep within an Underwater bunker. Your mission - to successfully exterminate your enemy's civilian population whilst disabling their ability to attack your own. Start by launching your subs and bombers in order to control the last nuclear resources of the world and increase your credits...

Stark and foreboding, it feels like you’re at the centre of the Cold War even before a nuke has been fired.Refreshingly simple yet bursting with depth, Admiral is enjoyable as both a quick blast as well as subtle strategic epic.

name: Adventures With Oslo: World of Water
summary:
Adventures with Oslo: World of Water is the follow-up to Adventures with Oslo: Tools and Gadgets and covers information about water. In comparison to its predecessor, the game features less, but more involved sections:

Winston and the Great Water Cycle Story: This is a linear novel which tells the story of Winston, the water molecule. Within the text are multiple icons which lead to supplemental scientific information, animations and videos.

Oslo's Coloring Book:A drawing program which can be used for own creations or coloring included pictures.

Oslo's WaterWorks BoardGame: A virtual board game. First the player chooses the aggregate phase of the playing stone which means either 0, 1 or 2 advances on the board. The second step is clicking the spinning button which gives two randomly generated numbers: one of them can be chosen and the number is added to the number of moves which are executed afterwards. Depending on the field the player lands on, special effects may take place: receiving clams or having the aggregate phase locked for the next move. The goal is to collect as many clamps before the first player reaches the end of the road.

In addition there are a few short animations which can be triggered in the main menu.

name: Ad Mortem
summary: ''Ad Mortem'' (It means "Forward to Death" in Latin) it's a MBF21 - Halloween-themed community project organized and made by anonymous users from 4chan's Retro Games board. This mapset contains 27 playable maps (24 "Single player" maps, 3 Secret maps and Deathmatch support [MAP05, MAP07, MAP08]) uses a great variety of custom textures that matches the spooky environment (includes GothicTX, OTEX textures and others. read the .txt file for more info.) This community project contains New reskinned weapons, Graphics and 7 new custom enemies. Grab your SMG and let's celebrate this spooky month slaughtering some skelli-bois and ghouls!

name: Ada: Tainted Soil
summary: Step into the world of Ada, a story-driven single-player 2D top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals to enjoy. Combine different weapons, spells, and skills to overcome all obstacles in your way. Be prepared for the unexpected.

name: Adventures of Squeak Bottoms
summary: A rogue-like, RPG style game with tantalizing, comedic retro style gameplay. Face randomized level difficulty using procedural level design. Enjoy in-game economy to purchase upgrades and pets to help you on your journey to save your beloved pet from the evil clutches of Syhco Taiter!

name: Adventure Tanks
summary: Engage in fierce battles against rival tanks in a variety of arenas. Strategize your moves, dodge enemy fire, and reach the ultimate goal!

name: A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light
summary: Embark on a journey as a small dragon across enchanting worlds, find runes with arcane powers and learn many powerful abilities. Master them to solve puzzles, defeat mighty enemies and eventually face the Black Dragon in this unique action-platformer!

name: Adventure Game
summary: An irreverent low-poly action RPG made through Net Yaroze for the original Playstation

name: Adventure Ponies
summary: A fan made remake of Adventure Ponies for the Atari XL/XE.

name: Adrift in the Backrooms
summary: Adrift in the Backrooms is a adventure multiplayer game that is a mix of backrooms games and more traditional co-op.

name: Adventure Story
summary: Play the role of the Adventure Guild President of the Magic World. Manage and utilize every resource at hand. Dig out legendary stories from various regions and spread your guild name throughout the entire empire. Finally, obtain powerful artifacts hidden around the world.

name: Adventurer Farmer: Save my Son!
summary: Use the dynamics of movement with the rope to take the character to the rescue of his son, who accidentally fell out of the plane, while traveling from the farm to the city. Along the way you will need to solve puzzles and explore distant planets across the galaxy to unlock original music and songs to power up your navigation system and get back to Earth in this cosy adventure purrrfect for all ages.

name: Adrift
summary: Small abstact blue void map using custom textures.

name: A Day With Mochi
summary: In A day with Mochi, you play as Mochi, a young cat who has just arrived on the tropical island of San Felicete. You must help the local cats and fill up your photo album with Polaroids by making mischief. Interact with your world, charm the people (or make them angry), make a mess and escape to the rooftops...

name: Adult Sheriff
summary: Wild West saloon shooting game with anime girls.

name: Adventurers Guild Inc.
summary: Adventurers Guild Inc. is a turn-based management game where you run the business behind the heroics! Hire staff, post quests, and fulfill adventurers' needs (while taking a cut). Manage your budget, grow your reputation, watch adventurers scramble and build the greatest guild of all!

name: Adarna
summary: Loosely based on the 17th century corrido written by José de la Cruz, Adarna follows the journey of Prince Juan and his two older brothers, Princes Pedro and Diego. The King of Berbanya has fallen sick and the only cure for his disease is a song from the legendary Adarna Bird. One by one, the older brothers set off in search for the creature but the years pass by without them returning. Juan then decides to take matters into his own hands and convinces his parents — afraid for their remaining son — to let him go on the same quest.

name: Ad Astra: Sci-Fi Tower Defense
summary: Lose yourself in an indie solo-dev. treasure that harkens back to arcade classics! All while thumping along to killer retro-inspired beats by Ovani sound. Embark on an epic tower defense adventure against awe-inspiring machine monstrosities, made by a devoted gamer for devoted gamers.

name: A Day In The Future
summary: Game that puts you in the shoes of a citizen of the future that need to find 3 keys to access to a gate. The main gameplay consists in a side-scrolling shoot 'em up, but there are some minigames as well.

name: A Dual Ascent
summary:
"Once upon a time, there was a mountain; a mountain so tall, it touched the sky. It was the Great Mountain of Wonders.

An Old Pilgrim, who came from a land far away, was on his way to the summit.

But a fallen Little Star had the exact same idea, for she thought she might return home, if she reached the top of the Mountain..."

name: Adhvan Chakra
summary: Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.

name: A Directionless Cycle
summary: A Directionless Cycle is a 2D Sokoban game where you explore a game that's slowly degrading, while you control multiple tiles with different directions at the same time.

name: Adagio
summary: A young composer passes by an auditorium and chances upon a dancing performance that changes his very life.

name: Adrift
summary: In the far future, mankind lives in huge cities on the bottom on the ocean. These cities are controlled entirely by artificial intelligences, yet one human supervisor rests in an artificial sleep, watching over the AIs with his subconsicious mind. Then, one day, something unexpected happens: The supervisor awakens... to find out his connection to the city has been entirely severed...

name: Adrift
summary: Adrift is a game about being lost in space.

name: Adopt A Boyfriend
summary:
Riley has grown tired of time-wasters and first dates with no chemistry.

Wanting to feel loved again, they hastily turn to ARA, the Agency for Romancing Animalfolk, hoping the agency can give them hope in the world of romance.

Excitement builds for the day when their new chance at love will arrive, when not one, but two hot animal boys show up on their doorstep!

will you pursue the friendship and adoration that comes with the people-pleasing bunny Aramis? Or push through the stoic exterior of cute kitten Kujo to find his heart of gold underneath?

name: Adventuring With Matilda!
summary:
Step into the shoes of an aspiring adventurer and delve into a perilous dungeon alongside Matilda, a beautiful elf with a secret, exploring and deepening your bond through shared trials and bonding moments.

Embark on a 30-day expedition through a 30-floor dungeon, where each level presents randomized events and challenges, and strengthen Matilda by exploring and engaging in friendly interactions. Balance dungeon exploration with deepening her bonds to maximize your team's effectiveness.

name: Adspectabilis
summary: Explore the world of Adspectabilis and solve all kinds of Relaxing, Perspective-based Puzzles.

name: A Delver Dreams Their Own Demise
summary: A short gamelike thing that takes you through a series of moments each with a different style of gameplay.

name: A Death in Hyperspace
summary: When your captain dies suspiciously halfway through a hyperspace transit, you know you’re in trouble. Not because you need a captain — as an embodied AI spaceship, you can pilot yourself just fine — but because, as an aficionado of mysteries and detective stories, you know there’s only one explanation: murder most foul.

name: Adventurous Slime
summary: Adventurous Slime is a mini metroidvania about a small but very courageous slime going on an adventure. Featuring a magical world full of dangerous creatures and powerful ancient items to find, colorful pixelated visuals and chiptune songs.

name: Adequately Ever After
summary: Save a princess! Kill an evil mage! Solve puzzles! Or just argue with the narrator and marry someone inappropriate. With dozens of different endings, adventure is yours to command in this satirical fairy tale.

name: Adventure Trip: London
summary: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: Adventure Book in Dimension
summary: Adventure Book in Dimension is a turn-based RPG based on the novel Wonderful Dimensional Journey. In the game, you as a new member of the human wizard team "Tribal Clan", experience the main adventure story of the "Tribal Clan" in a magic book given by your predecessors.

name: A Dream About Parking Lots
summary: Look for your car in a series of mazes and parking lots while you talk to your therapist about feeling lost. An interactive short story about trying to make sense out of the unreal. Based on real dreams!

name: Ad Mortem
summary: Ad Mortem is a brutal multiplayer medieval Melee Slasher set in the corrupted world of Contrara. You play as a Vessel, a byproduct of the death of the Old Gods. Your hollow soul prevents your passage into the afterlife, binding you to this world. Through this eternal struggle, you will engage in team-based PvP combat against other Vessels upon the ravaged battlefields of the two warring factions; the Palisadean and the Hantrii. Fight with your allies, slay monsters and men, and delve into the dungeons of the Deities in a mad quest of retribution and power.

name: A Dog Called Buddy
summary: A short PSX tower defense style game about protecting a dog. Survive 6 hours while the rescue department is coming. Creatures from the fog are going to try to devour your 'buddy'.

name: Adventures & Quests: The Black Crystal
summary: The king's advisor sends you on an important mission. A sinister magician seeks the power of the black crystal and plans to unleash its dark powers. Start an exciting adventure with this fantastic hidden object game!

name: Adventures In Time & Space
summary: ~ Escape from the Pharaoh's Tomb + Pirates on Target + Xatrom Command ~

name: Adrenalinkick
summary:
Feel like Ghost Rider and race across the highways and streets of any regions.

A race in the grey area of the law, because there is no speed limit for you.
But always remember,
every decision could be your last.
You don't have unlimited guardian angels.

name: A day with Marco
summary: A sound engineer's daily adventure in court. Help Marco juggle sullen judges, quirky colleagues and bosses always on his heels.

name: Advanced V.G.: Saturn Tribute
summary: Compete for the title of the strongest fighter and claim the legendary prime real estate! A dazzling fighting game!

name: Adventure Awaits in The Secret of the Golden Key
summary: A family friendly adventure visual novel that makes reading fun! Accessibility is top of mind with voice-acted read-along narration with friendly fonts for readers with dyslexia. Experience hand drawn art and make important choices to determine how your story unfolds.

name: Adepts Arena
summary: Adepts Arena is a first-person adventure for both flat-screen and VR, featuring advanced physics-based effects. Master the power of the earth element, learn new abilities from ancient spirits, and aid them in their war against the sinister Golem Army!

name: Adohiinage
summary: A survival horror experience set in a cursed forest. Players must explore, solve puzzles, and evade terrifying creatures lurking in the shadows. With relentless tension, a haunting atmosphere, and monsters hiding within the woods. Survival depends on wit, and instinct.

name: A Day's Work
summary: Explore, harvest resources, catch pet rabbits, and help friendly characters as you uncover secrets in this small, wholesome, single-player adventure.

name: A Difficult Game About Wheelchair
summary: Overcome the obstacle course while sitting in a wheelchair, using unique controls.

name: Adventure of Samsara
summary: A hero resurrected. A new Adventure. With stunning, 2D pixel art, Adventure of Samsara combines classic gameplay, a deeply connected world, and a heady, twisting narrative of death, rebirth and memory. Become the Solar Champion and restore balance to the multiverse.

name: A Deep Dive
summary: You are the pilot on a mission deep underseas. Unfortunately, your vessel doesn't appear to be as sturdy as you thought and now you have to carefully maneuver down, steering into the bubbles with the crank in order to stay level.

name: Advent/Archive
summary: Advent/Archive is a short fan-game, made in RPG Maker MV, featuring Shiori Novella, and guest starring other talents from Hololive. You play as Shiori, navigating an underground dungeon in search of the Archive. You will have to fight through tough monsters and discover treasure to make it all the way through.

name: Adorable Garden
summary: A stress-free, relaxing tycoon simulator filled with cool gardeners, cute plants and beautiful gardens! Come enjoy the idle life simulation game where you are free to relax!

summary: Adorable Adventures is a cozy third-person exploration game where you play as Boris, a curious baby boar who has to learn how to use his nose to reunite his family after a forest fire.

Advent: Dawn
summary: A research trip turns deadly when seven strangers are trapped in a vast cave beneath a remote island. 『Advent: Dawn』 is a sci-fi mystery visual novel where you must escape through fear, fractured trust, and whispers from the deep. Will you unravel the mystery before the cave unravels you?

name: Adventopia
summary: Retired priest Morris and nephew Light rebuild a town via match-3 puzzles, restoring buildings and managing resources. Dispatch ex-adventurers to gather blueprints, and befriend unique residents to craft cozy stories.

Ad Aquilonem: Seto’s Journey
summary: Slash, jump, pet, and run. Guided by the wind, a heartfelt journey through ancient ruins.

name: Adventure Trip: Wonders of the World - Collector's Edition
Adventures of Megara: Demeter's Cat-astrophe - Collector's Edition
Adventures in Calculon
summary: Gather and choose adventurers by using your math skills to grow your army in this auto-battler to defeat all enemies through the world of Calculon.

name: Adventure Realm
summary: JRPG Dungeon Crawler! Join Lusio in exploring a new realm! Fight various monsters, earn dungeon coins and discover the power of the Gemstones!

name: Adventurer's Gate
summary: An adventure RPG where ancient portals unlock access to mysterious worlds. Explore, fight, collect runes, and help the villagers of Aorilys unveil the secrets of the eight dungeons.

name: Adventurer Shop Simulator
summary: Dive into a medieval fantasy world as a shopkeeper providing tools for brave adventurers embarking on their quests. Buy and sell weapons, upgrade and customize your shop, optimize your space, unlock new gear, and more. After all, behind every hero stands a master shopkeeper.

name: AD Blocker: An Action Puzzle Game
summary: A fast-paced head-to-head puzzler featuring grid-based gravity and a unique linear garbage system. Challenge an eccentric cast of characters in Story Mode, or host a Quick Match for 0-2 players! Are you ready to block some ads?

name: Adrenaline Overdrive
summary: In this retro-styled FPS, tear through an alternate 1980s Brooklyn as a vengeful detective enhanced by experimental drugs. Master supernatural movement abilities, and uncover the truth behind your brother's murder - before the power that drives you becomes your doom.

name: Adventure in Hender´s Castle
summary: Cast magic spells and explore an old Castle in this 3d action-adventure game. Overcome obstacles, solve puzzles and fight the dark forces that have taken hold of your ancestral home.

name: Adorate
summary: Take the role of an evil god amassing a cult of followers, build their town, and defend them from incoming holy forces!

name: A Dog Story
summary: A heartwarming and hauntingly mysterious short story exploring the spirit of a dog that lingers on Earth to deliver a final goodbye to its young master.

name: Advanced Lawnmower Simulator
summary: A tribute to the most POWERFUL and ACCURATE lawn mowing game of the 80's!

name: Adventure in Wonderwood
summary: Lucia and her friends travel to Wonderwood, a magical world full of challenges, mysteries, and adventures. Will they be able to open the legendary magic chest?

name: Adrenaline: May the Sun Return
summary: ADRENALINE: May The Sun Return is a first-person parkour game where you try to escape a procedurally generated futuristic district. Master your reflexes as you make your way through this hermetically sealed city.

name: Ad Astra Infinita: The New Evolution
summary: Fight some battles, gain some levels, rock out to some chunky riffs, and experiment with combining overpowered abilities in a world bent on creating a supreme killing machine.

name: Adult Education
summary: Adult Education is a steamy visual novel set in an adult evening school, where a sultry teacher develops an intimate interest in her female students.

name: Adventure in Russia: Road to Harvetsky
summary: The main character is the usual average schoolboy, who can be found on the street after the 7th lesson. But it's not so simple, because he has a dream inside of his head, a dream that you have to implement!

name: Adventures of a Snowboarder
summary: You are in the role of a novice snowboarder who accidentally moved off the wrong mountain) and now you have big problems with him. You need to go around all the obstacles to drive as far as possible and try to survive!

name: ADT Pilot 01
summary: Confront the moral dilemma, and then become the hero that saves the world.

name: Adult Life Yuri Bundle by Team ANPIM
summary: Collection of 4 yuri stories by Team ANPIM, featuring women who are 23 years and older! No longer students, they are finding romance while balancing the responsibilities of working, rent, and adulting.

name: Adventures with Alan Parkour 3D
summary: The goal of the game is to reach the portal that will take you to the next level. To do this, you need to jump on the blocks without falling into the lava.

name: Advent Arena
summary: A PvP card-game/tower-defense hybrid.

name: Addiction Solitaire
summary:
Addiction Solitaire is a quick paced game of Solitaire that’s very quick to learn but takes time to master. The deep strategy is sure to get you addicted to this classic card game.

This fun game is a variation of the classic patience game and is often called Addiction Solitaire, Gaps Solitaire, or Addictive Solitaire.

MobilityWare is the maker of the best card games in the App Store, including the #1 Solitaire and Spider Solitaire games.

Addiction Solitaire has the same high standards and polished gameplay you’ve come to expect from the makers of the #1 free Solitaire game! Download now, and experience a fun new twist on this classic card game you know and love with the best Addiction Solitaire in the app store.

name: Adventures of Mister Big T 2: Dimensional Problems
AddicDead
summary: Survive waves of zombies with various heroes, unlocking increasingly powerful weapons in a post-apocalyptic world with escalating difficulty. Gain experience and complete challenges in this third-person bullet hell.

name: Adventures of Astronaut Max
summary: Join astronaut Max in thrilling space adventures with turn-based battles and real-time exploration. Battle mutants, monsters & more. Upgrade skills, uncover mysteries.

name: Adventarum
summary: Adventarum is a fantasy idle battler where you fight monsters, earn loot, and rise through the Adventurer’s Guild. Upgrade skills, craft gear, and unlock epic quests as you grow from lone adventurer to guild master.

name: Addition Subtraction Multiplication Division Magician
summary: You are a wizard from another world, using Math to create your own magic, entering different spaces, facing a constant stream of enemies, plundering various treasures to fill your vault. Of course, you have to live to take away these spoils.

name: Ada
summary: Ada is a cozy looking soulslike game. Help Ada embark on a journey to uncover what is happening to her. Explore the ever changing world she finds herself in. Meet new friends and foes as you reveal the truth that awaits.

name: Adapta Solva
summary: Rid a dormant forest of corruption by using the elemental abilities of an Adaptarian. Follow along as life and nature return as you drive corruption out of the world. Find collectables and take a breather on benches and chairs scattered through a forgotten world.

name: Adrift
summary: explore derelict ship. find out why there is A missing crew. And be careful of things that could be lurking in the shadows.

name: Add Cross
summary: This pencil puzzle involves filling in the blanks with numbers 1 - 9 to match the numbers in the problem squares. Enjoy the light-hearted effects and have fun!

name: Adai's Adventures
summary: "Adai's Adventure" is a card construction game with Rouge. Players can complete different challenges by gradually improving their attributes and card deck. And unlike previous card games, game attacks are selected through roulette, and cards usually do not cause direct damage.

name: A Dance of Lords
summary: Wage war through poker in this game of strategy and conquest. Form alliances, crush your enemies and seize the throne!

name: Adaptation
summary: When you were being transported to a secret facility, the helicopter crashed. You find yourself in a mysterious forest with no memory of who you are. Fight mutants and evolve. Build, explore, survive — in this terrifying survival simulator.

name: Adaptive Hero
summary: Unleash your inner hero in this thrilling action-adventure! Leap, climb, and swing through untamed wilderness, uncovering hidden paths and ancient temples. Discover the fate of your missing father, unravel the mysteries of an ancient cult, and unveil the society's secret before it crumbles.

name: A Date With Yuika
summary: A short story about you and Yuika, in a date, to talk about relationships and a possible future.

name: Addy
summary: It's hard to focus on schoolwork when she's missing.

name: A Deep World
summary: Guide a little green creature as it goes deep into a dark, dangerous underwater world once sealed off. You'll need to explore, hide, and outmaneuver different predators to find your lost friend and make it back home in one piece. Whatever you do, avoid the nests!

name: Adeline's Story
summary: «Adeline’s Story» — a psychological-horror visual novel about a girl who moves from a bustling city to a godforsaken village, where the nighttime silence is ripped apart by inhuman screams and people vanish one by one.

name: Adept
summary: Conquer the world with fire and sword in a world where chaos reigns.

name: A Devastated City
summary: A Devastated City is a 3D point and click adventure game! You are one of the few survivors lost in a devastated city. Explore devastated houses in search of food and water, fight zombies and do everything possible to survive in this nightmare world.

name: A Dialogue Within
summary: A psychological narrative experience where perception fades and reality unravels. Explore, observe, and feel the descent into the human mind.

name: A Difficult Game About Letters
summary: Transform into letters to overcome platforming challenges and save your friend from evil King in this crayon-style adventure!

name: Adventure Time
summary: This is a jacked-up Rogue-like game where you explore a dark and twisting dungeon. You are seeking ever-more powerful loot to fight the ever more terrifying monsters of the deep. Because the game is turn-based, you can take your time and think about your actions.

name: A Drop of Color
summary: A story-driven RPG puzzle game where you solve color-based puzzles and engage in side-scrolling shooter action in an arcade.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Land of the Rising Sun
A Dogs Dream
summary: Test your sixth sense. Will you eat a wild rabbit, or tie someone to the train tracks? Every choice is yours to make. May you find a reason to laugh inside your nightmares.

name: Advent Calendar
summary: A cozy idle advent calendar game — unlock new items each day and decorate your little Christmas room at your own pace.

name: Advance, Fish!
summary: In this subversive aquatic survival-strategy game, you wield fins, not rods. As a captive fish in a twisted arena, ignite rebellion! Crush hooks with razor teeth and carve freedom through layered hunter traps.

name: Advanced Kick Challenge
summary: Take the Advanced Kick Exam and become a true kick master!

name: Aduk: Curse of the Spirits
summary: Washed ashore on a forbidden island, you face ruthless soldiers and an invisible terror. Every step brings you closer to breaking the curse… or embracing it forever.

name: Adventurer's Shop
summary: Open a shop to sell loot! Medieval dragon-slaying & treasure-hunting in dark fantasy style. Clear stages for gear—auto-combat, automatic loot collection. Loot quality & equipment affixes are random. Fight! Sell! Become the greatest medieval adventurer!

name: Adventure of Realms
summary: Oathbearer is a stylized Soulslike action-RPG. Master weighty, timing-based combat, wield elemental magic to reshape ruins, and topple colossal multi-phase bosses to end the Abyss… or take it.

name: Adventure Mosaics. Winter Holidays
summary: Enjoy a winter fairy tale with Ellie! Learn more about the nature in the winter! Piece your adventure together! 150 exciting levels for players of all ages!

name: Adventure Jampilation
summary: An ever-growing compilation of all the short adventure games made by Gugames during various game jams

name: Adventure Jam
summary: Adventure Jam is a level-based adventure game featuring FPS, Roguelike and RPG. Combine Gun in surprising ways to experience diverse Build gameplay and explore procedurally-generated levels. Fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own.

name: Adventure Guild Receptionist
summary: Always wanted a fantasy world desk job?! Manage eccentric adventurers like a lazy witch, tsundere fairy & useless bard! Approve quests, keep them alive, pay off Elfie's crippling tax debt, and rake in gold for the Guild!

name: Advent of the Reaper
summary: Advent of the Reaper is a retro-inspired, dark fantasy tactics RPG! Engage in challenging battle maps with a rich story told through Visual Novel scenes as you brandish your scythe to uncover a dark plot threatening the realm!

name: Adventure Seekers: Lost to Sea - Collector's Edition
summary: From hidden coves to sunken wrecks, explore breathtaking locations, solve puzzles, and unravel Rafael’s mysterious connection to a pirate captain with dark intentions.

name: Adventures of Carson: Fractured Continuum
summary: Adventures Of Carson: Fractured Continuum, a 2D rogue-lite action-platformer. Take advantage of an expansive array of weapons and abilities as you fight through constantly changing planets devastated by space and time. Die and face the most dangerous enemy, yourself.

name: Adventures of Caine McDowell: The Porkian Encounter
summary: Tap into your space pilot intuition as you explore an alien world, fighting monsters and fleeing from a vicious bounty hunter in this retro, puzzle-based, sci-fi epic!

name: ADHD Horror Anthology
summary: A collection of atmospheric horror games about ADHD. Four authors' interpretations of psychological horror with different mechanics and narratives

name: Adit 11
summary: You have become a prisoner of the endless mine, but after eleven accident-free days you can step out into the moonlight!

name: Adiverboz
summary: Adiverboz is a 2D psychological horror game set in Brazil. As Oz, investigate the past and collect evidence about an orphanage marked by trauma. Face terrifying creatures and dark secrets, but beware: your choices can reveal the truth or lead you to the abyss.

name: Admirals of Ophiuchus
summary: Design massive ships, bristling with weapons, on a macro scale. Engage in fleet-vs-fleet battles, featuring many different tactics. Play alone or in Coop combat missions, or form two teams of players (each with own fleet) to fight in an arena.

name: A Dragons Dawn
summary: You are but a hatchling. Journey across a surreal world where echoes of your ancestors guide you towards your wings. The game’s unique movement mechanics bring to life every treacherous slope and slippery gorge. Procedural animation brings the dragon to life like never before!

name: Adrenaline
summary: Adrenaline: Online is a casual, open-world, racing game. Join your friends online to drive, explore, race and work jobs together; earning cash to customize and upgrade your ride and show off in style.

name: Adrenaline High
summary: Gameplay focused FPS, fast paced parkour and chaotic combat, with CO-OP campaign help your friends or stab them in the back

name: Adrenaline or Die
summary: Fast-paced action with ADRENALINE instead of health. Keep it maxed during combat to unleash devastating abilities! Only two paths exist: ADRENALINE or DEATH!

name: Ad Iterum
summary: Ad Iterum is a turn-based top-down 2D roguelike set in a decaying, ever-shifting world. Flesh is fragile, but you can hack it. Enhance your body, embrace mutations, or form ancient blood pacts. Descend into the depths, scavenge what’s left of humanity, and crawl back...if you can. Kill. Die. Repeat.

name: A Date with Death 2: Remnants
summary: Train, chat, and flirt your way through the Underworld in this romantic story-driven chat simulator. Create your own Grim Reaper, connect with your team through text and video calls, and decide who you are when the past no longer defines you in a sequel to A Date with Death!

name: Adventure Master
summary: This unique trivia game is the perfect way to be tested to see if you could actually follow in the steps of the famous adventurers, Indiana Jones and Nathan Drake with topics including outdoor survival skills, handguns, geography, world history, SCUBA, plane flight and so much more.

name: Advent Incremental
summary: An incremental game unlocking over 24 real-time days as you prepare Santa's workshop for Christmas.

name: Adrian's Quest
summary: Adrian's Quest is a single-player VR action-adventure game filled with physics-based puzzles and bizarre gunfights, set on a dusty, run-down alien planet home to strange creatures and a declining population.

name: A Date With Chester 2
summary: A Date With Chester 2 is a short, standalone story about remembering the good times. You've been with Chester for a long time. If there's one thing you're sure of, it's that things don't always go as you expect.

name: Adamant Heart
summary: A Megaman Legends inspired, lighthearted shooting adventure! Force your way into mysterious ruins filled with ancient robots, find valuable treasure to upgrade your gear, and discover their true origin and purpose.

name: Adventurers Shop
summary: Forge your legacy as both merchant and hero. Explore Zoldar, battle monsters for rare materials, and craft epic gear. Team up with friends to build a thriving shop in the village markets or arm yourselves to conquer the dangerous depths of the wild.
